actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution classifying Haiti as a major drug transit country under section 481(h) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

summary.text: Classifies Haiti as a major drug-transit country, within the meaning of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, for the trafficking of illegal narcotics into the United States. Considers a certification under such Act to have been timely made.

titles.title: A joint resolution classifying Haiti as a major drug transit country under section 481(h) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.
